original: @197a # // rgya gar skad du //
analyzed: @197a # // rgya gar skad du //
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: k'a la tsakra au pa de sha /
analyzed: k'a la tsakra au pa de sha /
translated: Kalacakra-upade≈õa

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:üîΩOral Instructions of the Wheel of Time

original: dus kyi 'khor lo'i man ngag / bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dus kyi 'khor lo'i man ngag / bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the glorious BhagavƒÅn Vajrasattva.

original: mkha' la kun zhes sems kyis mig mi 'dzums shing rdo rje'i lam zhugs pas //
analyzed: mkha' la kun zhes sems kyis mig mi 'dzums shing rdo rje'i lam zhugs pas //
translated: In the sky, the mind, without closing the eyes, enters the vajra path.üîΩFrom the empty space, smoke, mirage, fireflies, stainless light, lamp,

original: stong las du ba smig rgyu mkha' snang dri med gsal dang mar me dang // 'bar ba zla ba nyi ma rdo rje che mchog thig le mthong ba'o //
analyzed: stong las du ba smig rgyu mkha' snang dri med gsal dang mar me dang // 'bar ba zla ba nyi ma rdo rje che mchog thig le mthong ba'o //
translated: flame, moon, sun, great vajra, and bindu are seen.

original: de dbus sangs rgyas sku ni yul bral du ma longs spyod rdzogs sku'o //
analyzed: de dbus sangs rgyas sku ni yul bral du ma longs spyod rdzogs sku'o //
translated: In the middle of that, the buddha body, free from objects, is the sambhogakƒÅya.

original: chu 'dzin dang bral mkha' la brtan lta rnal 'byor pas ni snang bar bya //
analyzed: chu 'dzin dang bral mkha' la brtan lta rnal 'byor pas ni snang bar bya //
translated: The yogi, seeing it stable in the sky, free from clouds, illuminates it.

original: ji srid dus kyi rtsal ri mo nag 'od dri med 'phro mthong ba //
analyzed: ji srid dus kyi rtsal ri mo nag 'od dri med 'phro mthong ba //
translated: As long as the patterns of the power of time, black light, and stainless radiance are seen,

original: de la kun mkhyen sku ni rnyog med sna tshogs kha dog chu nyi mtshungs //
analyzed: de la kun mkhyen sku ni rnyog med sna tshogs kha dog chu nyi mtshungs //
translated: in that, the body of the omniscient one, stainless, is like the sun in the water.

original: rnam kun rang gi sems de yul dang rnam bral gzhan gyi sems nyid med //
analyzed: rnam kun rang gi sems de yul dang rnam bral gzhan gyi sems nyid med //
translated: In every way, one‚Äôs own mind is free from objects, and the mind of another does not exist.

original: sku mthong ba ni nyi ma re re dus su srog gi rlung 'gog byed //
analyzed: sku mthong ba ni nyi ma re re dus su srog gi rlung 'gog byed //
translated: The vision of the body is the stopping of the life-force wind, at the time of each day.

original: ji srid rang lus 'od zer 'khor lo 'khor bzhin pa yis bskor mthong bas //
analyzed: ji srid rang lus 'od zer 'khor lo 'khor bzhin pa yis bskor mthong bas //
translated: As long as one sees one‚Äôs own body surrounded by a circle of light,

original: sngom brtson rnams kyi zla drug reg spangs lam sems zhi ba'i bde bar 'gro //
analyzed: sngom brtson rnams kyi zla drug reg spangs lam sems zhi ba'i bde bar 'gro //
translated: the yogis and yoginis, who have abandoned contact for six months, go to the path of the bliss of the mind of peace.

original: chags dang chags bral mtha' thog skad cig la ni khyab bdag dbugs grangs 'phel //üîΩmgo dra nang gi dga' bral lhan skyes ye shes rnam shes dag dbus su //
analyzed: chags dang chags bral mtha' thog skad cig la ni khyab bdag dbugs grangs 'phel // mgo dra nang gi dga' bral lhan skyes ye shes rnam shes dag dbus su //
translated: In the final moment of the end of attachment and nonattachment, the increase of the number of breaths of the all-pervading lordüîΩin the middle of the head nƒÅ·∏çƒ´, free of joy, is the connate gnosis.

original: gnyid log dus su rdo rje padma dag gis gnyis gnyis sbyor bde gang //
analyzed: gnyid log dus su rdo rje padma dag gis gnyis gnyis sbyor bde gang //
translated: In the middle of the pure consciousness, the bliss of the union of the two vajras and lotuses at the time of sleep

original: de yi 'phel byed bla ma'i bka' yi dbang gis 'phel la 'de mtshar med //
analyzed: de yi 'phel byed bla ma'i bka' yi dbang gis 'phel la 'de mtshar med //
translated: is increased by the guru‚Äôs words. There is no increase of that which is amazing.

original: rnal 'byor pa bzang la sbyor rgyal bdag la 'jug bdud dang nyon mongs 'joms //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa bzang la sbyor rgyal bdag la 'jug bdud dang nyon mongs 'joms //
translated: The conqueror of the mƒÅras and afflictions enters into the good yoga of union.

original: da @197b ni sems 'od gsal ba la 'jug pa'i phyir //
analyzed: da @197b ni sems 'od gsal ba la 'jug pa'i phyir //
translated: Now, in order to enter into the clear light of the mind,

original: kha zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: kha zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so on.

original: 'dir sngags kyi tshul dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i tshul rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis pa bslab par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir sngags kyi tshul dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i tshul rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis pa bslab par bya ste /
translated: Here, one should train in the two types of yoga, the way of mantra and the way of the perfection vehicle.

original: nam mkha' dang bla gab med pa la rnal 'byor goms par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang bla gab med pa la rnal 'byor goms par bya'o //
translated: One should practice yoga in the sky and in the open air.

original: gang nam mkha'i rnal 'byor la slob pa de mtshan mo mun pa la nam mkha' la kun du zhen pa'i sems kyis du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma mthong ba'o //
analyzed: gang nam mkha'i rnal 'byor la slob pa de mtshan mo mun pa la nam mkha' la kun du zhen pa'i sems kyis du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma mthong ba'o //
translated: One who trains in the yoga of the sky sees signs such as smoke and so on in the sky at night in the darkness with a mind that is attached to the sky.

original: mig mi 'dzums shing rdo rje'i lam zhugs pas zhes bya ba ni dbu mar srog gi rlung zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: mig mi 'dzums shing rdo rje'i lam zhugs pas zhes bya ba ni dbu mar srog gi rlung zhugs pa'o //
translated: The phrase with eyes unclosed, entering the vajra path means entering the central channel with the life-force vƒÅyu.

original: stong las zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' la kun du zhen pa'i sems dang mig mi 'dzums pa dang / rdo rje'i lam du zhugs pas stong pa las du ba dang smig rgyu dang mkha' snang dri ma med pa gsal ba dang de bzhin du mar me ni mtshan mo'i sbyor bas mthong ngo //
analyzed: stong las zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' la kun du zhen pa'i sems dang mig mi 'dzums pa dang / rdo rje'i lam du zhugs pas stong pa las du ba dang smig rgyu dang mkha' snang dri ma med pa gsal ba dang de bzhin du mar me ni mtshan mo'i sbyor bas mthong ngo //
translated: From the empty means that by the mind of attachment to space, the eyes not closing, and entering the path of the vajra, from the empty, one sees smoke, a mirage, a clear stainless sky, and likewise, a lamp by the yoga of night.

original: de nas sprin med pa'i nam mkha' mthong ngo //
analyzed: de nas sprin med pa'i nam mkha' mthong ngo //
translated: Then one sees a cloudless sky.

original: de nas yang nam mkha' la nyin mo'i sbyar ba ni /
analyzed: de nas yang nam mkha' la nyin mo'i sbyar ba ni /
translated: Then again, the yoga of the day in the sky

original: nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba //
analyzed: nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba //
translated: is the self-originated one that arises from space.

original: shes rab ye shes me bo che //üîΩzhes gsungs te /
analyzed: shes rab ye shes me bo che // zhes gsungs te /
translated: The great fire of wisdom and gnosis

original: sprin med pa'i nam mkha' la 'bar ba mthong ba'o //üîΩrnam par snang mdzad 'od chen po //
analyzed: sprin med pa'i nam mkha' la 'bar ba mthong ba'o // rnam par snang mdzad 'od chen po //
translated: is the blazing appearance in the cloudless sky.üîΩThe great light of Vairocana

original: ye shes 'od zer lhang nge ba //
analyzed: ye shes 'od zer lhang nge ba //
translated: is the shining light of gnosis.

original: zhes pa ni zla bar snang ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni zla bar snang ba'o //
translated: This is the appearance of the moon.üîΩThe lamp of migrating beings

original: 'gro ba'i mar me zhes pa ni nyi mar snang ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i mar me zhes pa ni nyi mar snang ba'o //
translated: is the appearance of the sun.üîΩThe lamp of gnosis

original: ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba ni sgra gcan du snang ba'o //
analyzed: ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba ni sgra gcan du snang ba'o //
translated: is the appearance of RƒÅhu.

original: gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba //
analyzed: gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba //
translated: The great splendor is the light.

original: zhes bya ba ni glog ste cha dam pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni glog ste cha dam pa'o //
translated: This is the lightning, the supreme part.

original: rigs pa'i rgyal po sngags mchog mtsho //
analyzed: rigs pa'i rgyal po sngags mchog mtsho //
translated: The king of mantras, the supreme mantra, is the ocean.

original: zhes bya ba ni thig ler mthong ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thig ler mthong ba'o //
translated: This is seen in the drop.

original: de ltar mtshan ma bcu 'dus pa la sogs par mtshan mo'i sbyor ba gsungs shing //
analyzed: de ltar mtshan ma bcu 'dus pa la sogs par mtshan mo'i sbyor ba gsungs shing //
translated: Thus, the union of the ten signs and so forth is taught as the practice of the night.

original: mtshan yang dag par brjod par nyin mo'i sbyor ba bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: mtshan yang dag par brjod par nyin mo'i sbyor ba bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
translated: In the Litany of the Names of Manjushri, the union of the day is taught by the Blessed One.

original: gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed pa ni bum pa dang ras la sogs pa rnam pa thams cad skur mthong ba'o //
analyzed: gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed pa ni bum pa dang ras la sogs pa rnam pa thams cad skur mthong ba'o //
translated: The king of mantras, which accomplishes the great aim, is the seeing of all aspects of the vase, cloth, and so forth as the body.

original: de dbus zhes bya ba ni thig le'i dbus su sangs rgyas kyi sku yul dang bral ba rdzas med cing rtog pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku du ma mthong ba'o //
analyzed: de dbus zhes bya ba ni thig le'i dbus su sangs rgyas kyi sku yul dang bral ba rdzas med cing rtog pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku du ma mthong ba'o //
translated: In the middle of that, in the middle of the drop, the body of the Buddha, free from objects, is seen as the many insubstantial bodies of the enjoyment dimension, which are the objects of the imagination.

original: de nas sku'i sbyar bas me shigs pa'i sgra nyid thos so //
analyzed: de nas sku'i sbyar bas me shigs pa'i sgra nyid thos so //
translated: Then, by the union of the body, the sound of the burning fire is heard.

original: de ltar sprul pa'i sku ni gzugs su snang ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar sprul pa'i sku ni gzugs su snang ba'o //
translated: Thus, the emanation body is the appearance of form.

original: longs spyod rdzogs sku ni sgrar snang ba'i don to //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs sku ni sgrar snang ba'i don to //
translated: The Enjoyment Body is the meaning of the appearance of sound.

original: 'dir nyi ma'i sbyor ba ni chu 'dzin dang bral ba'i nam mkha' brtan par lta ba'i rnal 'byor pas snang bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir nyi ma'i sbyor ba ni chu 'dzin dang bral ba'i nam mkha' brtan par lta ba'i rnal 'byor pas snang bar bya ste /
translated: Here, the application of the sun is that the yogi should see the firm sky free from clouds,

original: snga dro dang phyi dro'i nyi ma la rgyab bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: snga dro dang phyi dro'i nyi ma la rgyab bstan par bya'o //
translated: facing the sun in the morning and evening.

original: @198a * // gzhan du na nyi ma'i 'od zer rnams kyi rab rib tu 'gyur te /
analyzed: @198a * // gzhan du na nyi ma'i 'od zer rnams kyi rab rib tu 'gyur te /
translated: Otherwise, the sun's rays will be blurred,

original: des gnod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des gnod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are harmful.

original: de ltar nyi ma re re la bslab par bya zhing snang ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar nyi ma re re la bslab par bya zhing snang ba'o //
translated: Thus, one should train and see the light every day.

original: ji srid dus kyi rtsa aa ba dh'u t'i'i nang du chud pa'i thig le'i dbus su ri mo nag po skra'i tshad tsam gyi 'od zer dri ma med pa 'phro ba mthong ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: ji srid dus kyi rtsa aa ba dh'u t'i'i nang du chud pa'i thig le'i dbus su ri mo nag po skra'i tshad tsam gyi 'od zer dri ma med pa 'phro ba mthong ba'i bar du'o //
translated: Until one sees in the middle of the bindu that has entered the avadh≈´tƒ´ channel in the middle of the body a black line the size of a hair, radiating stainless light rays.

original: de la kun mkhyen sku zhes pa ni khams gsum ma lus pa rnyog pa med pa'i chu'i nang gi nyi ma lta bu mdog sna tshogs pa kun rang gi sems yul dang rnam par bral ba de nyid gzhan gyi sems mi shes pa'i phyir gzhan gyi sems ma
analyzed: de la kun mkhyen sku zhes pa ni khams gsum ma lus pa rnyog pa med pa'i chu'i nang gi nyi ma lta bu mdog sna tshogs pa kun rang gi sems yul dang rnam par bral ba de nyid gzhan gyi sems mi shes pa'i phyir gzhan gyi sems ma
translated: The Buddha‚Äôs mind is not the mind of others, because he does not know the minds of others.

original: yin pa'o // 'dir dang po rang gi sems snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sha'i spyan gyis yang dag par mthong ba'o //
analyzed: yin pa'o // 'dir dang po rang gi sems snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sha'i spyan gyis yang dag par mthong ba'o //
translated: Here, the first, the vision of one‚Äôs own mind, is seen by the Buddha‚Äôs eye of flesh.

original: lha'i mig la sogs pas gzhan gyi sems shes pa mthong ba'o //
analyzed: lha'i mig la sogs pas gzhan gyi sems shes pa mthong ba'o //
translated: The vision of the divine eye, etc., is the seeing of the knowledge of the minds of others.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan lnga po de dag ni chos yang dag sdud pa las gsungs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan lnga po de dag ni chos yang dag sdud pa las gsungs so //
translated: The Blessed One taught these five eyes in the Dharmasa·πÉgƒ´ti S≈´tra.

original: de ltar rim pa bzhin sha'i spyan dang / lha'i spyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang / shes rab kyi spyan dang / ye shes kyi spyan rnams bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar rim pa bzhin sha'i spyan dang / lha'i spyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang / shes rab kyi spyan dang / ye shes kyi spyan rnams bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, in due order, the eye of flesh, the divine eye, the eye of wisdom, and the eye of gnosis arise through the power of meditation.

original: de nas ma gzigs pas ci yang mi mnga' ba'i thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas ma gzigs pas ci yang mi mnga' ba'i thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, since he does not see it, he becomes omniscient, who has nothing whatsoever.

original: de'i phyir ku mthong bas nyi ma re re'i dus su srog gi rlung 'gog pa bum pa can gyi sbyor ba bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ku mthong bas nyi ma re re'i dus su srog gi rlung 'gog pa bum pa can gyi sbyor ba bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should practice the yoga of the vase-breathing, which stops the life-wind, every day, by seeing the sun.

original: ji srid rang lus 'od zer 'khor lo 'khor bzhin pas bskor ba mthong ba zhes bya ba ni sngon du gsungs pa'i sku'i nang du mthong ba'o //
analyzed: ji srid rang lus 'od zer 'khor lo 'khor bzhin pas bskor ba mthong ba zhes bya ba ni sngon du gsungs pa'i sku'i nang du mthong ba'o //
translated: As long as one sees one's own body surrounded by a circle of light rays, which means that one sees it inside the body as previously described.

original: sdom brtson rnams zhes bya ba ni las dang po pa tshangs par spyod pa rnams so //
analyzed: sdom brtson rnams zhes bya ba ni las dang po pa tshangs par spyod pa rnams so //
translated: The celibate practitioners are beginners.

original: zla ba drug tu reg spangs zhes bya ba ni dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba spangs pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba drug tu reg spangs zhes bya ba ni dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba spangs pa'o //
translated: For six months, abandoning contact means abandoning the practice of the two organs.

original: lam gyi sems zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi sku'i sems so ;
analyzed: lam gyi sems zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi sku'i sems so ;
translated: The path-mind is the mind of the empty body.

original: / zhi ba'i bde bar 'gro zhes bya ba ni mi zad pa'i bde ba thob pa'o //
analyzed: / zhi ba'i bde bar 'gro zhes bya ba ni mi zad pa'i bde ba thob pa'o //
translated: One goes to the bliss of peace means that one attains inexhaustible bliss.

original: chags dang zhes bya ba ni dkar po'i phyogs so //
analyzed: chags dang zhes bya ba ni dkar po'i phyogs so //
translated: The attachment is the bright side.

original: de'i mthar song ba zhes bya ba ni bcu drug pa'i cha'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de'i mthar song ba zhes bya ba ni bcu drug pa'i cha'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The end of that is the characteristic of the sixteenth part.

original: de nas chags bral zhes bya ba ni nag po'i phyogs so //
analyzed: de nas chags bral zhes bya ba ni nag po'i phyogs so //
translated: Then, ‚Äúfree from passion‚Äù is the dark lunar phase.

original: de'i thog ma zhes bya ba ni nag po'i phyogs la ma zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i thog ma zhes bya ba ni nag po'i phyogs la ma zhugs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe beginning of that‚Äù is not entering the dark lunar phase.

original: skad cig ces bya ba ni skad cig ma gcig la mngon par byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid de'i skad cig go //
analyzed: skad cig ces bya ba ni skad cig ma gcig la mngon par byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid de'i skad cig go //
translated: ‚ÄúMoment‚Äù is the moment of the moment of the characteristic of manifest enlightenment.

original: dbugs grangs 'phel zhes bya ba ni nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i dbugs gsang ba'i rdo rje'i nor bu'i rtse mo nas 'phel lo //
analyzed: dbugs grangs 'phel zhes bya ba ni nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i dbugs gsang ba'i rdo rje'i nor bu'i rtse mo nas 'phel lo //
translated: ‚ÄúThe increase of the number of breaths‚Äù is the increase of the twenty-one thousand six hundred breaths from the tip of the jewel of the secret vajra.

original: brgya phrag sum cu rtsa drug gi dbugs dgu brgyad dgu brgya'i @198b grangs bkag cing spangs pa nges na sa gnyis gnyis thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brgya phrag sum cu rtsa drug gi dbugs dgu brgyad dgu brgya'i @198b grangs bkag cing spangs pa nges na sa gnyis gnyis thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: When the number of breaths is blocked and abandoned, two stages are attained.

original: de ltar lte ba dang / snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang // dpral bar bzhi dang / drug dang / brgyad dang / bcus sa rnams thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar lte ba dang / snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang // dpral bar bzhi dang / drug dang / brgyad dang / bcus sa rnams thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that way, the stages are attained by four, six, eight, and ten at the navel, heart, throat, and head.

original: gtsug tor du srog thams cad zad pas sa bcu gnyis 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gtsug tor du srog thams cad zad pas sa bcu gnyis 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the u·π£·πáƒ´·π£a, all the prƒÅ·πáas are exhausted, and the twelfth stage is attained.

original: de nas mgo'i dra ba'i nang nas gsang bar 'ong ba ni dga' ba dang lhan cig skyes pa dag gis dbu ma'o //
analyzed: de nas mgo'i dra ba'i nang nas gsang bar 'ong ba ni dga' ba dang lhan cig skyes pa dag gis dbu ma'o //
translated: Then, from within the net of the head, the secret coming is the central one with the innate joy.

original: de ltar ni gnyid log pa'i dus su'o //
analyzed: de ltar ni gnyid log pa'i dus su'o //
translated: That is the time of sleep.

original: snying gar ni ye shes dbu ma'o //
analyzed: snying gar ni ye shes dbu ma'o //
translated: In the heart, the gnosis is the central one.

original: mgrin par ni sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / ye shes kyi thig le'i rang bzhin gyis so //
analyzed: mgrin par ni sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / ye shes kyi thig le'i rang bzhin gyis so //
translated: In the throat, the nature of the bindu of body, speech, mind, and gnosis.

original: gang dpral ba nas 'ongs pa ni gnyis kyi sbyor ba'i bde ba'o //
analyzed: gang dpral ba nas 'ongs pa ni gnyis kyi sbyor ba'i bde ba'o //
translated: That which comes from the forehead is the bliss of the union of the two.

original: de'i bde ba ni bla ma'i bka'i dbang gis khu ba'i bde ba gyen du 'gro bar byed do //
analyzed: de'i bde ba ni bla ma'i bka'i dbang gis khu ba'i bde ba gyen du 'gro bar byed do //
translated: That bliss, by the power of the guru‚Äôs instruction, causes the bliss of the seminal fluid to ascend.

original: sngon du gsungs pa'i srog 'gog pa dang bral ba'i bar du 'phel ba la ngo mtshar med do //
analyzed: sngon du gsungs pa'i srog 'gog pa dang bral ba'i bar du 'phel ba la ngo mtshar med do //
translated: There is no wonder in the increase up to the stopping of the prƒÅ·πáa previously mentioned.

original: de ltar nyon mongs pa dang / bdud bcom nas rgyal ba'i bdag po la ste rnal 'byor bzang po aa ba dh'u t'i'i gnas pas lo gcig gi sbyor bas g-yon dang g-yas su chud pa'i srog rnams bsad nas rgyal ba'i bdag po stong pa nyid kyi sku la 'jug go //
analyzed: de ltar nyon mongs pa dang / bdud bcom nas rgyal ba'i bdag po la ste rnal 'byor bzang po aa ba dh'u t'i'i gnas pas lo gcig gi sbyor bas g-yon dang g-yas su chud pa'i srog rnams bsad nas rgyal ba'i bdag po stong pa nyid kyi sku la 'jug go //
translated: Having thus conquered the afflictions and the demons, the lord of victors, by the yoga of abiding in the avadh≈´tƒ´, having killed the life-breaths that flow in the left and right channels by the practice of one year, enters the body of emptiness, the lord of victors.
